posts.post_title: Looking for T210 Kelly (mascot) and Yaeger...
posts.post_content:
Let's make a deal.  

Please send me a PM if you have either available.  I'll make it worth your while.  :D

Seriously, 45 views and no response??  Was it something I said?  :(

As I mentioned, I would definitely like to purchase these cards outright.
